mapper.update: UPDATE dxj_config_liable SET deptId="${deptId}",deptName="${deptName}",`user`="${user}" ,department="${department}" WHERE userId ="${userId}" and alarmType="${alarmType}" -- and team="${team}"
UPDATE dxj_config_manage SET deptId="${deptId}",deptName="${deptName}",`user`="${user}" , manageDepart = "${manageDepart}" WHERE userId ="${userId}"
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dxj_config_liable WHERE userId ="${userId}" and department="${department}" -- and team="${team}";
mapper.select: SELECT name as deptName,LAYERCODE as layerCode from dxj_sys_dept
SELECT name as text,ID as cid, (case when PARENT_ID is null then 'parentid' else PARENT_ID end ) as pid from dxj_sys_dept WHERE LAYERCODE !='00010003' order by LAYERCODE
SELECT DISTINCT a.`NAME` deptName,a.LAYERCODE as layerCode ,a.ID deptId from dxj_sys_dept a WHERE a.LAYERCODE not like '00010003%' AND a.LAYERCODE != '0001' ORDER BY a.LAYERCODE
SELECT CNAME as user,USERNAME userId from dxj_sys_user WHERE BELONG_DEPT="${equipId}"
SELECT department from dxj_config_liable WHERE userId="${userId}" and alarmType="${alarmType}" -- and team="${team}"
SELECT user from dxj_config_manage WHERE userId="${userId}"
SELECT user from dxj_config_manage where userId="${userName}" and manageDepart like CONCAT('%',"${part}",'%')
